StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: CAT_TREE
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE CAT_TREE (cat OUT SYS_REFCURSOR, catid IN NUMBER)
AS
BEGIN
OPEN cat FOR
SELECT category.id, category.parent_id, catname
FROM category
JOIN
( SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT id AS parent_id, id
FROM category
WHERE CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF = 1 AND id = catid
CONNECT BY PRIOR id = parent_id) t1
ON t1.parent_id = category.id
ORDER BY parent_id;
END;
